bibl.title: Familiarity Breeds: Incest and the Ptolemaic Dynasty. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The question of 'incest'. - Incestuous Ptolemies: some genealogical questions. - Barriers to success: genetics and taboos. - Royal incest: pragmatism or symbolism? - Luxury, decadence and prejudice. - Conclusion. - Pp. 28-34: Bibliography.
AGER Sheila L., Familiarity Breeds: Incest and the Ptolemaic Dynasty. Avec résumé en anglais.
